enb_long_title: Workshop on Land-Use, Land-Use Change and Forestry
sentences: On Tuesday, 11 July, participants met in morning and afternoon sessions to consider additional human-induced activities under Article 3.4 of the Kyoto Protocol.
Lead authors of the IPCC Special Report presented an overview of the Special Report's coverage of this issue, followed by a question-and-answer session.
In addition, representatives of five Parties and one NGO made presentations, also followed by a question-and-answer session.
Participants then engaged in a general discussion on the issue.
